X

XmlDistiller - class jpo.XmlDistiller.
a class that exports a tree of chapters to an XML file
XmlDistiller(File, SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class jpo.XmlDistiller
 
XmlFilter - class jpo.XmlFilter.
This class overrides the abstract javax.swing.filechoose.FileFilter class (not the java.io.FileFilter) to provide a true or false indicator to using JFileChoosers whether the file is a directory or image ending in .xml.
XmlFilter() - Constructor for class jpo.XmlFilter
 
XmlReader - class jpo.XmlReader.
class that reads an XML collection and creates a tree of SortableDefaultMutableTreeNodes
XmlReader(InputStream, SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.XmlReader
Constructor an XML parser that can read our picture list XML files.
XmlReaderThread - class jpo.XmlReaderThread.
This class was invented to spawn a new thread and to the Xml parsing there.
XmlReaderThread(InputStream, SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode, JTree) - Constructor for class jpo.XmlReaderThread
This thread type class fires off an XmlReader in a thread.
xmlData - Variable in class jpo.JarDistillerThread
holds the whole xmlfile as it is being built
xmlFile - Variable in class jpo.SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode
A file reference to the file that was loaded.
xmlFileNameJTextField - Variable in class jpo.CollectionDistillerJFrame
text field that holds the filename of the target XML file
